mapper.select: select emp_id empId from employee where emp_id = #{id}
select emp_failure_cnt empFailureCnt from employee where emp_id = #{empId}
mapper.update: update employee set emp_failure_cnt = #{loginFailureCnt} where emp_id = #{empId}
update employee set emp_failure_cnt = 0 where emp_id = #{id}
update employee set enabled =0 where emp_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select emp_id empId, emp_name empName, dept_name deptName from employee, department where employee.dept_id = department.dept_id and emp_id = #{empId}
select dept_cost deptCost from employee, department where employee.dept_id = department.dept_id and employee.emp_id=#{empId}

select res_id resId, reservation.emp_id empId, reservation.mr_id mrId, mr_name mrName, br_name brName, to_char(res_start_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') resStartTime, to_char(res_end_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') resEndTime, to_char(res_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') resDate, res_purpose resPurpose, res_state resState, res_type resType, res_cost resCost from reservation, branch, meeting_room where reservation.mr_id = meeting_room.mr_id and meeting_room.br_id = branch.br_id and reservation.emp_id = #{empId}

select res_id resId, reservation.emp_id empId, reservation.mr_id mrId, mr_name mrName, br_name brName, to_char(res_start_time) resStartTime, to_char(res_end_time) resEndTime, to_char(res_time) resDate, res_purpose resPurpose, res_state resState, res_type resType, res_cost resCost from reservation, branch, meeting_room where reservation.mr_id = meeting_room.mr_id and meeting_room.br_id = branch.br_id and reservation.emp_id = #{empId}
and res_state = 'res_2'
and ((sysdate - 7) < res_start_time)
and ((sysdate - 30) < res_start_time)
and ((sysdate - 180) < res_start_time)
and ((sysdate - 365) < res_start_time)
select to_char(res_start_time,'HH24:MI') resStartDate, to_char(res_end_time,'HH24:MI') resEndDate from reservation where mr_id = #{mrId} and to_char(res_start_time, 'YY/MM/DD') = #{availableDate}
select m.mr_Name mrName, b.br_name brName from meeting_room m, branch b where m.br_id = b.br_id and m.mr_id = #{mrId}

select a.res_id resId,to_char(res_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') resDate , to_char(res_start_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') resStartDate, to_char(res_end_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') resEndDate , r.res_state resState, b.br_name brName,m.mr_name mrName from reservation r,attendee a,meeting_room m, branch b where r.res_id=a.res_id and m.mr_id=r.mr_id and b.br_id=m.br_id and a.attend_id =#{empId} and to_char(res_start_time,'YYYY-MM')= to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM') and to_char(res_start_time,'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS')>to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') order by to_char(res_start_time,'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS')
